sentences.en: He was a good man, but always forebear his wrath and complaint.
sentences.cn: 他是一个老好人，善于克制自我、隐忍无奈。

sentences.en: It's much larger than its 75 forebear. Perhaps it could be the 75 OS.
sentences.cn: 它比它的先祖75要大多了，或许可以说它是75的超大版本。

sentences.en: Our forebear might even teach us a few old tricks that could be used to help the living.
sentences.cn: 祖先甚至可以教我们一些有助于生活的古老窍门。
